Key Match Events: DeMar DeRozan scored the two biggest shots of the evening
Sacramento Kings came back from a 17-point deficit
Consecutive scores from Jovic and Keon Ellis brought the game back to nine
Post-Match Reflections: The game was a tough one for both teams, with neither shooting well
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a close one, with both sides needing wild and wacky plays to keep things tight
Others: The game went into double overtime, with Miami eventually losing 123-118
The Kings' offensive rebounding kept them alive, forcing a clutch game
Tyler Herro was the early exception, scoring 12 points on 5-of-7 shooting
